services.name: Skill Gap Analyzer
services.overview: The Skill Gap Analyzer is an AI-powered tool designed to identify and quantify skill gaps within an organization. By analyzing employee performance data, job descriptions, and industry trends, the tool provides actionable insights for targeted training and development initiatives. It leverages Natural Language Processing (NLP) to extract skills from text-based data, and Machine Learning (ML) to predict future skill needs based on company goals and market demands. This allows companies to proactively address skill deficiencies, optimize training budgets, and improve overall employee performance and retention. The tool integrates seamlessly with existing HR systems and provides customizable reports and dashboards for easy interpretation and tracking of progress.
problems_addressed: Ineffective training programs due to lack of accurate skill gap identification.
Wasted training budget on irrelevant or unnecessary skills development.
Difficulty in predicting future skill needs based on evolving business goals and industry trends.
Lack of visibility into the actual skills proficiency of employees.
Inability to align training initiatives with overall company objectives.
target_users: HR departments responsible for employee training and development.
Training managers who design and implement training programs.
Company executives looking to improve workforce performance and ROI on training investments.
core_features: Skill Extraction: Automatically extracts required and demonstrated skills from job descriptions, performance reviews, project outcomes, and other relevant documents using NLP.
Performance Analysis: Analyzes employee performance data to assess current skill proficiency levels and identify areas for improvement.
Gap Identification: Compares required skills with actual skills to pinpoint specific skill gaps within teams, departments, or the entire organization.
Predictive Analytics: Uses ML models to forecast future skill needs based on company objectives, industry trends, and technological advancements.
Personalized Training Recommendations: Generates customized training recommendations for individual employees or teams, tailored to address identified skill gaps.
Reporting & Dashboards: Provides comprehensive reports and interactive dashboards that visualize skill gaps, training progress, and ROI on training initiatives.
Integration with HR Systems: Seamlessly integrates with existing HRIS, LMS, and performance management systems to streamline data flow and ensure data consistency.
Benchmarking: Compare internal skill data against industry benchmarks to identify areas where the company excels or lags behind competitors.
user_journeys: An HR manager logs into the Skill Gap Analyzer platform, uploads recent employee performance reviews and a set of job descriptions. The system extracts relevant skills from both data sets, identifies discrepancies, and generates a report highlighting the most prevalent skill gaps across different departments. Based on the report, the HR manager can then assign targeted training programs to specific employees to address those skill gaps.
ai_capabilities: NLP for skill extraction from text-based data (job descriptions, performance reviews, project reports). Uses transformer-based models like BERT or RoBERTa for named entity recognition (NER) and relationship extraction to identify skills and their context.

Machine Learning for performance analysis and gap identification. Uses classification or regression models to predict skill proficiency based on performance data. Considers feature engineering to incorporate factors like experience, training history, and performance ratings.
Predictive analytics using time series forecasting models (e.g., ARIMA, Prophet) to forecast future skill needs based on historical data, company growth projections, and industry trends.
Recommendation engine using collaborative filtering or content-based filtering to suggest personalized training programs based on individual skill gaps and learning preferences.

input_data_types: Employee performance reviews (text and numerical ratings)
Project outcomes (text reports and numerical metrics)
data_schema_recommendations: Employee Table: employee_id (INT, Primary Key), employee_name (VARCHAR), department (VARCHAR), job_title (VARCHAR), hire_date (DATE)
PerformanceReview Table: review_id (INT, Primary Key), employee_id (INT, Foreign Key), review_date (DATE), reviewer_name (VARCHAR), overall_rating (FLOAT), text_comments (TEXT)
JobDescription Table: job_id (INT, Primary Key), job_title (VARCHAR), department (VARCHAR), description_text (TEXT), required_skills (TEXT)
TrainingHistory Table: training_id (INT, Primary Key), employee_id (INT, Foreign Key), course_name (VARCHAR), completion_date (DATE), score (FLOAT)
Skills Table: skill_id (INT, Primary Key), skill_name (VARCHAR), skill_category (VARCHAR)
data_sources: Third-party industry reports (e.g., LinkedIn Learning, Gartner)
data_requirements.privacy_and_compliance: Compliance with GDPR, CCPA, and other relevant data privacy regulations is crucial. Anonymize or pseudonymize sensitive employee data where possible. Obtain consent for data collection and usage from employees. Implement data security measures to protect against unauthorized access and breaches.

required_integrations: Performance management systems (e.g., Lattice, Culture Amp)
Email providers (e.g., SendGrid, Mailgun) for notifications
Analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, Mixpanel) for tracking usage and engagement
integration_plan.authentication_strategy: OAuth 2.0 or SAML for secure single sign-on (SSO) integration with existing HR systems. Consider Clerk or Auth0 for user authentication and authorization management.

technical_specifications.architecture: The architecture comprises a frontend built with Next.js, a backend powered by Node.js serverless functions, a PostgreSQL database (Planetscale or Supabase), and an AI pipeline using the OpenAI API. Data flows from HR systems into the database, where it is processed by the AI models. The frontend displays the results and insights to the user.

recommended_tech_stack.frontend: Next.js 14 App Router, TailwindCSS, shadcn/ui, Vercel conventions
recommended_tech_stack.backend: Node.js / Next.js server actions / Vercel serverless functions
recommended_tech_stack.database: Planetscale / Supabase / PostgreSQL with schema notes
recommended_tech_stack.storage: Supabase storage / AWS S3 / Vercel Blob
recommended_tech_stack.AI: OpenAI API, embeddings, vector DB (Pinecone/Supabase vectors)
recommended_tech_stack.CI_CD: GitHub â†’ Vercel automatic deploy pipeline

API_design: /api/employees: GET (retrieve all employees), POST (create a new employee)
/api/performance_reviews: GET (retrieve performance reviews for an employee), POST (upload a performance review)
/api/job_descriptions: GET (retrieve job descriptions), POST (upload a job description)
/api/skill_gaps: GET (analyze skill gaps and return report)
frontend_components: Dashboard: displays key metrics and overall skill gap analysis.
Employee Profile: shows individual employee skills and training recommendations.
Job Description Analyzer: allows users to upload and analyze job descriptions.
Report Generator: creates customizable reports on skill gaps and training progress.

deployment_instructions: Directory structure should follow Next.js conventions (app/, pages/, components/, utils/).
Environment variables: OPENAI_API_KEY, DATABASE_URL, AUTH_SECRET, NEXT_PUBLIC_CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY, CLERK_SECRET_KEY
Deploy the Next.js application to Vercel using the GitHub integration. Configure environment variables in Vercel settings.
Set the build output directory to '.next' and runtime to 'nodejs18.x' in Vercel.

pricing_strategy: SaaS subscription tiers based on company size (number of employees).
Usage-based pricing for API access or data processing.
Add-ons for advanced features like predictive analytics or personalized training recommendations.
customer_segments: Small to medium-sized businesses (SMBs) with limited HR resources.
Large enterprises with complex skill development needs.

success_metrics: Increase in employee engagement and retention.
Number of skill gaps identified and addressed.
Adoption rate of recommended training programs.
Accuracy of AI-powered skill gap analysis and prediction.
